origin: process can download some files from the internet to satisfy library dependencies, connection failures can cause some of modules or functionalities to be turned off or behave differently. Refer to the
local: 进程可以从internet下载一些文件以满足库依赖关系,连接失败可能导致某些模块或功能关闭或行为不同.参考

origin: If you experience problems with the build process, try to clean or recreate the build directory. Changes in the configuration like disabling a dependency, modifying build scripts or switching sources to another branch are not handled very well and can result in broken workspace.
local: 如果在生成过程中遇到问题,请尝试清理或重新创建生成目录.配置中的更改（如禁用依赖项、修改构建脚本或将源切换到另一个分支）处理得不是很好,可能会导致工作区中断.

origin: can run multiple compilation processes in parallel,
local: 可以并行运行多个编译进程,
选项表示 "运行 <数量> 工作同时进行".

local: 将自动检测可用处理器内核的数量,而不需要

origin: After successful build you will find libraries in the
directory and executables (test, samples, apps) in the
local: 目录和可执行文件（测试、示例、应用程序）

origin: CMake package files will be located in the build root:
local: CMake包文件将位于生成根目录中:

origin: Installation process only copies files to predefined locations and do minor patching. Library installed using this method is not integrated into the system package registry and can not be uninstalled automatically. We do not recommend system-wide installation to regular users due to possible conflicts with system packages.
local: 安装过程只会将文件复制到预定义的位置并进行小修补.使用此方法安装的库未集成到系统包注册表中,无法自动卸载.由于可能与系统包冲突,我们不建议常规用户在系统范围内安装.

origin: By default OpenCV will be installed to the
directory, all files will be copied to following locations:
